description:
------All the lectures with English subtitle/close caption----------


There are lots of demand to design awesome Facebook cover image. Since Facebook is the world biggest and popular social networking site. Facebook also 3rd largest most visited website in the world. You can earn money from freelancing site like upwork, freelancer, and fiverr etc. Or, you can design for yourself, for your friends, for your organization, for your business, for your website, for your blog, for your Twitter, Instagram cover image. You can use this image also as a banner for your blog or website. 

You don't have to know anything about Photoshop. In this course we will know how to install Photoshop CC as a trial for one month. Then, we will learn together the Photoshop which we need to design 10 awesome Facebook cover image or timeline image.

All the 10 Facebook covers editable PSD file, more than 30 stock
images are attached to this course, which are the combine worth of $150.  So take this course and design awesome Facebook cover by yourself.
title: Learn to Design 10 Awesome Facebook Cover by Photoshop
